TopicTitle: KSP how to change graphic language

Articles.Content:
I need help on changing the graphic language.

As you can see in the picture, the text on the rocket is in English but mine is in Chinese, how would I change it to English?

https://www.google.com/search?q=kerbal+space+program+menu+pic&rlz=1C1CHBF_enMY742MY742&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjVxqGZsb7ZAhULkZQKHTAICn4Q_AUICigB&biw=1600&bih=794#imgrc=gx-Jl7cAtyQLrM:

 

 

Edited February 24, 2018 by Dylan734
I'm sorry, but what is in Chinese? Did you download the Chinese version of the game accidentally?

Yea I did but I change the language by replacing the Chinese dictionary.cfg  with an English version. This made the language English but some things like pictures or contract icons would be in Chinese.
Why not just reinstall with the English version selected?
I would but sadly I have bad internet. It took me 3 days to install ksp.

Is it the Steam version? If yes, right click on the game's title in your Steam Library, select properties and under the 'Language' tab, select the one you want. Steam will download just the files it needs for this change so, I don't think either you or your internet connection will suffer for too long.

Its not steam version is there another way?

 

Edited February 25, 2018 by Dylan734

I don't know. Also, I'm not really familiar with KSP's online store. Their tech support might be able to do something, if you explain the situation to them. If they agree to help, make sure you keep the receipt at hand, because I'm fairly certain they're going to ask for it.

Edited February 25, 2018 by Atkara

If you downloaded a Chinese version, I'm afraid you'll have to download the English version and move your saves there to correct everything. While most of the text in KSP is stored as strings in a cfg file making it easy to edit, text written in the textures is probably embedded in the texture/models themselves and you won't be able to change it without editing these (which would be a massive pain).

If you have the store version, just go to Store, My Account, Download, select your OS and English language there and brace yourself for the download.

Unfortunately, the Chinese version is going to be in Chinese. There might be some elaborate way around it, but in the end it's going to be easier and better, and possibly even faster, to simply download the English version. 
Anyway, thread moved to support, now that we know what the issue is.

4 hours ago, Vanamonde said:

Unfortunately, the Chinese version is going to be in Chinese.

I would argue that it is fortunate that the Chinese version is in Chinese, but I think we all know how you meant that.

The only way to get the assets (textures, images, icons, etc.) in English would be to replace all the Chinese assets with English ones. For that you have two options: you can recreate all the assets from scratch in English and mod them into the game in place of the Chinese ones; or you can download the English version of KSP to access the English assets. I'm going to say that downloading the English version will be faster and much easier, even with very slow internet, and at that point you should move your save files over.

Or you could just keep playing with the Chinese assets. I don't know how much they impact the understanding of things since you were already able to change the language files. Either way, good luck.

Edited May 12, 2018 by Vanamonde

Please don't accuse each other of things like pirating the game. If you have some evidence that someone has, send it as a report to the moderating team. Otherwise, give your fellow players the benefit of the doubt, please.

Download the language pack from the store for the language you want and install it...
Or on steam - change the language to the one you want and validate KSP in it's properties in steam.

Changing the language/the language packs changes not only the text in game, but a bunch of textures that have writing on them as well.
